resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: In Xcode 12 , Apple has deprecated 'Legacy Build System'. In titanium module build 'Legacy Build System' is still used. See [here|https://github.com/appcelerator/titanium_mobile/blob/59f313aef87d3ea3492b3216cacec7900dc7a6b7/iphone/cli/commands/_buildModule.js#L465]. Update to use  'New Build System'.
fields.summary: iOS: Use new build system in module build

comments.body: This got fixed as part of TIMOB-27132. Closing.
